/bin/c++  -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/tester.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tester.dir/MatrixExceptions.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tester.dir/ClassMatrix.cpp.o  -o ../tester   -L"/home/tomer/Advanced Programmin 1/Ex3/matrix"  -Wl,-rpath,"/home/tomer/Advanced Programmin 1/Ex3/matrix" -lmatrix libExceptions.a libClassMatrix.a
